channel.title: Portfolios on Jirong's sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Jirong's sandbox

item.title: Portfolio Performance
item.description: Portfolio Performance The objective of the portfolio (from 2020 onwards) is to achieve the following against the benchmarks, Highest daily win rates in positive periods Highest sharpe ratio Highest sortino ratio Lowest max drawdowns against benchmarks Shortest recovery to previous watermark Positive alpha against all benchmarks Low beta against benchmarks (<= 0.5): Target to maintain beta at around 0.15-0.25 range. May employ shorting of overvalued counters to achieve targets.
